SEARCH
Package edu.uiowa.cs.warp

Class VisualizationFactory

java.lang.Object
edu.uiowa.cs.warp.VisualizationFactory
public class VisualizationFactory extends Object
Factory Class to create a visualization instance. This factory can be used to create different types of visualizations.
Version:
2.0 Fall 2025
Author:
sgoddard

    • createWarpVisualizations

      public static Visualizable createWarpVisualizations(WarpInterface warp)

      Parameters:
      warp - System for which the visualizations will be created
      Returns:
      viz The last visualization created for this system

    • executeVisualizations

      private static void executeVisualizations(Visualization viz)
      Executes the given visualization by exporting it to a file and, if requested in its options, displaying it on screen.

      This method first checks that the provided Visualization object is not null. It then retrieves its Options, writes the visualization to a file, and, if the options indicate that a display is requested, renders the visualization.

      Parameters:
      viz - the Visualization object to execute; if null, no action is taken

    • createWorkLoadVisualization

      private static Visualization createWorkLoadVisualization(WorkLoad workload, Visualizable.WorkLoadVisualizations choice)
      Creates a workload visualization based on the specified choice.

      This method selects and constructs the appropriate Visualization object depending on the given WorkLoadVisualizations choice. Supported visualization types include communication graphs, GraphViz graphs, input graphs, and sensor network visualizations. If the choice is not recognized, a NotImplementedVisualization is returned.

      Parameters:
      workload - the WorkLoad object that provides the data and options required to generate the visualization
      choice - the WorkLoadVisualizations enum value that determines which type of visualization to create
      Returns:
      the constructed Visualization object corresponding to the requested type; if the choice is unrecognized, a NotImplementedVisualization is returned

    • createSystemVisualization

      private static Visualization createSystemVisualization(WarpInterface warp, Visualizable.SystemVisualizations choice)
